hackathon-description-text: Our goal is to produce a hackathon evenly balanced in gender, maintain/increase the quality of hacks and take down the stereotypes that exist mostly in STEM fields.
hackathon-requirements: If you have technical questions for DevPost, hit up any of the mentors!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Pebble Steel's for best use of Pebble. (MLH Sponsored Prize)
Swag bags for best Domain. (MLH Sponsored Prize)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=151 Calle San Francisco, San Juan, San Juan 00901, Puerto Rico

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How unique and innovative is the demo?
Is the hack technically interesting or difficult?
Is the hack usable in its current state? Is the user experience smooth? Does everything appear to work? Is it well-designed?
Does the hack have that WOW-factor?

hackathon-location-address: 151 Calle San Francisco, San Juan, San Juan 00901, Puerto Rico
hackathon-description-header: Hackathon that will gather Puerto Rico's students in STEM for a weekend to hack and collaborate in great ideas!
